description: Tests the connection between the replication instance and the endpoint.

parameters.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

parameters.name: EndpointArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the replication instance.

nested_items.name: EndpointArn
nested_items.description: The ARN string that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The connection status. This parameter can return one of the following values:

nested_items.name: LastFailureMessage
nested_items.description: The error message when the connection last failed.

nested_items.name: EndpointIdentifier
nested_items.description: The identifier of the endpoint. Identifiers must begin with a letter and must contain only ASCII letters, digits, and hyphens. They can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceIdentifier
nested_items.description: The replication instance identifier. This parameter is stored as a lowercase string.
